channel.title: DS-Andromeda (Synthbird EP 2/4) - Arimyth [Retro / Synthwave] :arimyth:
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/arimyth/ds-andromeda
![Synthbird|500x500](upload://88aRacSVH0fDLZmqOGJKQw1VV3j.jpeg)
Second track from my 4 track EP; Synthbird–a mix of synthwave, experimental, and analog house.
Been hard at work on this and the following 2 tracks so... I hope you all enjoy. :slight_smile:
Special shoutout to @Matik for the initial inspiration behind the atmosphere of this track. You're the boss, boss!

item.title: DS-Andromeda (Synthbird EP 2/4) - Arimyth [Retro / Synthwave] :arimyth:
item.dc:creator: paroxyzm
item.description:
Super chill and upbeat at the same time. This track somehow feels so nostalgic and the whole vibe is just great. Something you could work on is maybe repetition. Try to change it up every once in a while, this could be the melody, the drum pattern, bassline, etc. Other than that i really enjoyed the track. Good job!

Read full topic
